user_instruction: 'Send an update to Maria (maria@email.com) about the latest developments. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["maria@email.com"],"subject":"Quick Update on Recent Developments","body":"Hi Maria,

I hope you’re doing well! I wanted to share a concise roundup of our most recent developments:

• Community Workshops – The schedule is now finalized for early next month. When you have a moment, could you please circulate the dates and registration link to your distribution list before the end of the week? Let me know if you need any supporting copy or graphics.

• Hiring – Our leading backend-engineer candidate has successfully completed the technical assessment and will be moving to a panel interview shortly. I’ll keep you posted on the outcome.

• Wellness Initiative – Employee enrollment continues to climb and we’ve seen an encouraging reduction in sick-day usage. The next four-week wellness challenge will kick off later this spring.

• Software Platform Release – The vendor has confirmed their maintenance window for a major update in mid-spring. We’re coordinating full backups, updated release notes, and a refreshed staging environment ahead of the rollout.

If there’s anything else you need—or any questions—just let me know.

Thanks for your help!

Best,
[Your Name]"}

formatted_items.content: I’ve sent Maria a concise update highlighting the key developments and next steps. Let me know if you’d like any adjustments or additional details!

final_output: I’ve sent Maria a concise update highlighting the key developments and next steps. Let me know if you’d like any adjustments or additional details!
